Describe the change and its purpose. Link any relevant issues.

Fixes #<issue-id>

## Type of change

- [ ] feat (new feature)
- [ ] fix (bug fix)
- [ ] refactor (no functional change)
- [ ] docs (documentation only)
- [ ] chore (tooling, CI/CD)
- [ ] test (tests only)

## Checklist

- [ ] My branch is up to date with `develop`
- [ ] I followed the Conventional Commits style
- [ ] I added/updated tests
- [ ] I updated docs (README/SETUP/API) if needed
- [ ] No secrets, large files, or debug prints
- [ ] CI passes locally (if applicable)

Add any UI screenshots, logs, performance notes, or migration notes here.
